channel.title: [PI] Pest Control!
channel.description:
Can someone post their PC_BOAT variable? I seem to get this error.
[code]src\server\rs2\content\minigames\PestControl.java:148: error: cannot find symbol
if(!player.PC_BOAT.containsPlayer(player) && waitingBoat .containsKey(player)) { ^ symbol: variable PC_BOAT location: variable player of type Client[/code]
